#summary &ouml character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesO

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &ouml

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ouml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d6/index.htm U+000D6].
  * `&Ouml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d6/index.htm U+000D6].
  * `&ouml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f6/index.htm U+000F6].
  * `&ouml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f6/index.htm U+000F6].
